Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the incident by stating that the monk was beaten up for praising Yogi Adityanath, without providing sufficient evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only relies on the reports from two Hindi dailies without providing any additional evidence or sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the monk was beaten up solely because he praised Yogi Adityanath, without considering other possible reasons for the incident.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim may have alternative explanations for the incident, such as the possibility that the monk hurt himself while intoxicated, as suggested by the Kanpur Nagar Police.
